DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize simvastatin may reduce adiponectin level insulin sensitivity overweight hypercholesterolemic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Simvastatin Reduces Adiponectin Levels Insulin Sensitivity
DOC.criteria: Lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol level 100 body mass index 23.0 Patients overt liver disease Chronic renal failure Hypothyroidism , myopathy Uncontrolled diabetes Severe hypertension , stroke Acute coronary event Coronary revascularization within precede 3 month , Alcohol abuse .
